gurmukhi: gurmuiK mn bc krm iekqR Bey AMg AMg ibsm sRbMg mY smwey hY
transliteration: Gurmukhi Man Bach Karam Ikatr Bhaay , Ang Ang Bisam Srabang Mai Samaaay Hai ?
translation: By practicing the teachings of Guru with mind, words and action, the devoted Sikh in attendance keeps every limb of his body in the memory of blissful Omnipresent Lord all the time.

gurmukhi: pRym rs AMmiRq inDwn pwn ky mdon rsnw Qkq BeI kihq n Awey hY
transliteration: Praym Ras Anmrit Nidhaan Paan Kay Madona , Rasanaa Dakat Bhaee Kahit N Aaay Hai ?
translation: He remains in a state of trance by drinking the loving elixir of Naam: He relishes not any other pleasure of life anymore.

gurmukhi: jgmg pRym joiq Aiq Ascrj mY locn ckq Bey hyrq ihrwey hY
transliteration: Jagamag Praym Joti Ati Asacharaj Mai , Lochan Chakat Bhaay Hayrat Hiraaay Hai ?
translation: The wonderful elixir that has caused him to live such a celestial state of trance is indescribable.

gurmukhi: rwg nwd bwd ibsmwd pRym Duin suin sÍn suriq iblY iblY iblwey hY ]52]
transliteration: Raag Naad Baad Bisamaad Praym Dhouni Souni , Sravan Surati Bilai Bilai Bilaaay Hai ?52?
translation: The radiance of love for Naam Simran exists in him a strange form that surprises all the beholders. (52)
